actions.committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to improve consumer access to passenger vehicle loss data held by insurers.

summary.text: Passenger Vehicle Loss Disclosure Act - Directs the Secretary of Transportation to require all insurers and self-insurers of passenger motor vehicles to disclose to the public, in a commercially reasonable, electronically accessible manner, for each passenger motor vehicle declared or determined to be a total loss: (1) the vehicle identification number and odometer reading; (2) the date of and primary reason for the total loss determination; and (3) whether the airbags deployed.

titles.title: A bill to improve consumer access to passenger vehicle loss data held by insurers.
